Welcome to the Popcorn Maker site’s documentation!¶

This is the Django app to power the Popcorn Maker

Popcorn Maker is the web app that acts as a backend and allows users to save their projects generated with Butter and Popcorn JS

Please note that you can run Butter as a standalone app and use Popcorn JS as a powerful HTML5 Media Framework

About playdoh¶

This project is based on playdoh. Mozilla’s Playdoh is an open source web application template based on Django.

To learn more about it, step by the playdoh project page.
